data.name: AboutPage
data.value: Every business unit could do with an accounting system that is capable of registering its economic activity in accordance with the existing legislation and regulations, as well as reflecting its results in a comprehensible and accurate manner. Entrepreneurs who don't think so, may discontinue reading… And if such accounting system is also independent of any individuals, minimizes the human factor, and maximizes automation, it would provide for more reliable and accurate information.

data.name: AboutPage10
data.value: Ensuring timely, correct and risk-free submission of mandatory reports to relevant public authorities

data.name: AboutPage11
data.value: Answering inspection related questions, letters and appeals of public authorities with prompt and substantiated figures solely through this accounting system

data.name: AboutPage12
data.value: Providing stakeholders with financial information for the financial year that is accurate and based on the results of management rather than the will of the managersı

data.name: AboutPage2
data.value: Based on the 10-year experience in this sphere, we can say that studying the economic activity of enterprises operating in the fields of production, service and sales during automation and software application has allowed us to recognize their weak, strong, risky and uncertain aspects. Taking this into account in our own activities, we have managed to develop more sophisticated applications and manage them in the accounting system.

data.name: AboutPage3
data.value: What are the advantages of such accounting system?

data.name: AboutPage4
data.value: Reflecting the operations of the enterprise on a daily basis

data.name: AboutPage6
data.value: Having a reliable forecast on monthly results at any point during the month

data.name: AboutPage7
data.value: An opportunity to get the results for the current month within a day or two after its end

data.name: AboutPage8
data.value: Faster verification of the results of your activity and ensuring real, reliable numbers

data.name: AboutPage9
data.value: Making informed quarterly decisions on business operations in terms of optimizations, changes, etc. based on the accounting data up to the results of the current year

data.name: AboutSection2
data.value: Every business unit could do with an accounting system that is capable of registering its economic activity in accordance with the existing legislation and regulations, as well as reflecting its results in a comprehensible and accurate manner. Entrepreneurs who don't think so, may discontinue reading…

data.name: AboutSection3
data.value: Based on the 10-year experience in this sphere, we can say that studying the economic activity of enterprises operating in the fields of production, service and sales during automation and software application has allowed us to recognize their weak, strong, risky and uncertain aspects. Taking this into account in our own activities, we have managed to develop more sophisticated applications and manage them in the accounting system.

data.name: accountingpage2
data.value: Dear entrepreneurs,We can assure you that today there are many small, medium and large business entities operating without an accounting policy. It is true that businesses can be managed, controlled and make profits without accounting policies. What is the Accounting Policy then? Who needs it? What is it for? And why do you need it? According to our law on accounting - Accounting policy is a set of specific principles, bases, conditions and approaches applied by accounting entities during the preparation and presentation of financial statements.

data.name: accountingpage3
data.value: Such principles, bases, and conditions are treated differently by each enterprise. This approach is the means through which accounting transactions are reflected, reports are presented and financial results, which may be right or wrong, are discussed... But more professional entrepreneurs should have a different approach. With the help of software developed on the basis of modern, current legal acts, which we will apply to your systems, the Accounting policy will be automatically drawn up and discussed, the scale of specific activity will be considered and approved. The working principle - accounting policy related to the financial results of the activity will no longer be discussed. Resources and capabilities are focused on other scopes.

data.name: Footer4
data.value:
Want a phone call with one of our consultants?
Leave your details and we will contact you as soon as possible. You can also send us an email.

data.name: generalservices10
data.value: The movable and immovable property of every enterprise is the main asset in the management of affairs. Decisions about inventories are made only based on the results of the stocktake. The comparison of accounting data of tangible, intangible, short-term or long-term assets with the actual count data demonstrates its effectiveness when working with (neutral) outsiders rather than with internal employees.

data.name: generalservices12
data.value: Transactions that have been misrepresented, whether knowingly or unknowingly, are reflected in the accounting registers when the enterprise provides info to the stakeholders as the executor of the transactions. Conducting an internal audit gives you confidence. You rest assured that those who did it knowingly were corrected and punished, and those who did it unknowingly were also corrected and involved in training.

data.name: generalservices13
data.value: Preparation and approval of audit report

data.name: generalservices14
data.value: According to the Civil Code: 91.4. A limited liability company (except for micro and small business entities) must engage an independent auditor annually to verify the accuracy of its annual financial statements (external audit). The audit of the company's annual financial reports can be conducted at the request of any stakeholder. In this case, the audit is performed at the expense of the stakeholder who requested the audit. The procedure for conducting audits of the company's activities is determined by legislation and the company's charter.The annual audit report applies to all entities except micro and small business entities. This is mandatory. However, business entities can also receive an independent audit report voluntarily.

data.name: generalservices16
data.value: Monthly, quarterly, annual financial reports are interesting for every entrepreneur: they can see the source, composition and location of economic assets in the Balance Sheet, whether it operates at a profit or a loss in the Income Statement, the flow of money in the Cash Flow Statement, and weather the capital involved has increased or decreased in the Retained Earnings Statement.

data.name: generalservices2
data.value: Reflecting the transactions of economic entities means registering them in accounting records, maintaining the necessary accounting data based on the national accounting standards and the Law on Accounting, correct calculation of taxes and other obligations, timely submission of declarations and reliable acquisition of any reciprocal, related accounting information.

data.name: generalservices4
data.value: Entrepreneurs have their own business approaches, which sometimes lead to slightly or greatly different accounting policies. A more appropriate, accurate and reliable manifestation of the records registered through managerial and financial accounting benefits successful business decision-making.

data.name: generalservices6
data.value: Most of the time, officers and managers achieve progress by focusing on expanding the enterprise's market share and business scope or maintaining competitiveness. But looking back on this path, inaccurate accounting data or forgotten and unreflected data undermines further development plans. The restoration and reconstruction of accounting includes restoring accounting with postperiod time, determining the sources of transactions, as well as locating them correctly by defining their composition.

data.name: generalservices8
data.value: Human resources are currently the most important element in enterprises. Their management, assessment, the correctness of settlements with employees or in short, the HR work is provided with modern systems to protect all kinds of settlements and the rights of employees through labor legislation and other normative legal acts and ensure their more efficient work.

data.name: PartnerPage
data.value: We offer our clients tailor-made solutions to help them succeed in their business.

data.name: preference
data.value: Your benefits from cooperating with us:

data.name: preference2
data.value: Automated accounting system that meet the modern requirements

data.name: preference3
data.value: Keeping track of your online accounting information with modern tools

data.name: preference4
data.value: Having your questions about online accounting information answered

data.name: preference5
data.value: Getting information, advice and recommendations from personnel qualified in this field

data.name: preference6
data.value: Stay informed on reports related to monthly, quarterly and annual financial results: Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Cash Flow Statement and Retained Earnings Statement

data.name: preference7
data.value: Analysis of your business with internationally accepted financial ratios, if necessary

data.name: preference8
data.value: Separate tax and management accounting and comparison on request

data.name: preference9
data.value: Representation of declared reports and accounting information before public authorities.

data.name: ServicesSection10
data.value: Dear entrepreneurs,We can assure you that today there are many small, medium and large business entities operating without an accounting policy.

data.name: ServicesSection12
data.value: This triad shapes the company's strategic processes in detail defining short- and long-term goals. This process is usually managed by the chief financial officer and the company's finance department. We are in a position to offer an understandable and software-based solution instead of large and bulky teamwork.

data.name: ServicesSection4
data.value: We comprehensively cover all the financial and management needs of a business providing general services from accounting and tax accounting to managerial and financial accounting, as well as employee management.

data.name: ServicesSection7
data.value: Our consulting services in budgeting, planning and forecasting, together with the specific accounting services we offer to companies, support businesses in creating and successfully implementing financial strategies.

data.name: specialservices10
data.value: Small and medium-sized business owners need financial statements to properly assess competitive conditions and financial results. In most cases, they are compiled by chief accountants in accordance with certain accounting reporting and submitted to the management. But it doesn’t do. And the CFO is seen as an extra employee, an excess cost. Accountants run the transactions, the chief accountant ensures their reflections and month-end close, and the engaged CFO service provides you with reliable financial statements that comply with the standards.

data.name: specialservices12
data.value: This triad shapes the company's strategic processes in detail defining short- and long-term goals. This process is usually managed by the chief financial officer and the company's finance department. We are in a position to offer an understandable and software-based solution instead of large and bulky teamwork.

data.name: specialservices2
data.value: This is an excellent choice when there is a need to immediately share increased workloads due to business conditions, available staff, allocated budget or other reasons, as well as to record accounting information on time or perform specially commissioned accounting work.

data.name: specialservices3
data.value: Provision of the entrepreneur’s online accounting information

data.name: specialservices4
data.value: Entrepreneurs often ask for a figure or get interested in a balance in order to make operational decisions. When the person in charge is not available or if they have to look up the information and return with the results, efficiency is lost and operational decisions are delayed. There are solutions that are informative enough to make one-touch operational decisions independent of anyone.

data.name: specialservices6
data.value: A business intelligence (BI) analyst analyzes complex data sets within a company to identify recommendations for business development and improvement. The company data is processed and presented with desirable, understandable and visual explanations.

data.name: specialservices8
data.value: Micro and some small business entities do not have the opportunity to constantly employ a big gun like a chief accountant and stay confident in the work of regular accountants and operators who are under the control of a senior staff. They also wish to have their own accounting, but are worried. In such cases, the chief accountant service is a perfect option.
